'''Mythcon 40''' was the fortieth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "Sailing the Seas of Imagination"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' [[Diana Glyer]] (Inkling scholar and professor), and [[James A. Owen]] (author and artist)
